item.name: VXLAN - Step 1L Underlay OSPF Unumbered Config - Leaf
item.description:
Things Needed for Leaf Config Phase 1 In the Environment Variables
MGMT-IP-PORT - https://172.16.235.214
SPINE-INT1 - eth1/1
SPINE-INT2 - eth1/2
LOOP0-IP - 172.16.0.1
LOOP0SEC-IP - 172.16.155.1
ANYCAST-RP - 172.16.0.250/32
username - admin
password - P@ssw0rd

request.description:
Enables these features:
 - feature bgp
 - feature ospf
 - feature nv overlay
 - feature vn-segment-vlan-based
 - feature interface-vlan
 - feature pim
 - nv overlay evpn

item.name: 2-Create Loopback with IPs for Underlay and VTEP
3-Convert Interface Medium to P2P, MTU to Jumbo

body.raw:
<intf-items>
    <phys-items>
      <PhysIf-list>
        <id>{{SPINE-INT1}}</id>
        <layer>Layer3</layer>
        <medium>p2p</medium>
        <mtu>9216</mtu>
        <descr>Uplink to Spine1</descr>
        <adminSt>up</adminSt>
      </PhysIf-list>
      <PhysIf-list>
        <id>{{SPINE-INT2}}</id>
        <layer>Layer3</layer>
        <medium>p2p</medium>
        <mtu>9216</mtu>
        <descr>Uplink to Spine2</descr>
        <adminSt>up</adminSt>
      </PhysIf-list>
    </phys-items>
    <lb-items>
      <LbRtdIf-list>
        <id>lo0</id>
        <descr>Underlay + Routing Functions</descr>
        <adminSt>up</adminSt>
      </LbRtdIf-list>
	</lb-items>
  </intf-items>

item.name: VXLAN - Step 1S Underlay OSPF Unumbered Config - Spine
item.description:
Things Needed for Leaf Config Phase 1 In the Environment Variables
MGMT-IP-PORT - https://172.16.235.214
Leaf1-INT1 - eth1/1
Leaf2-INT2 - eth1/2
LOOP0-IP - 172.16.0.200
LOOP0SEC-IP - 172.16.0.250
ANYCAST-RP - 172.16.0.250/32
username - admin
password - P@ssw0rd

request.description:
Enables these features:
 - feature bgp
 - feature ospf
 - feature nv overlay
 - feature vn-segment-vlan-based
 - feature interface-vlan
 - feature pim
 - nv overlay evpn

item.name: 2-Create Loopback with IPs for Underlay and AnycastRP

request.description: Replace SPINE1-LOO0-IP with SPINE2 if configuring Spine 2

item.name: 3-Convert Interface Medium to P2P, MTU to Jumbo

body.raw:
<intf-items>
    <phys-items>
      <PhysIf-list>
        <id>{{LEAF1-INT}}</id>
        <layer>Layer3</layer>
        <medium>p2p</medium>
        <mtu>9216</mtu>
        <descr>Uplink to LEAF-1</descr>
        <adminSt>up</adminSt>
      </PhysIf-list>
      <PhysIf-list>
        <id>{{LEAF2-INT}}</id>
        <layer>Layer3</layer>
        <medium>p2p</medium>
        <mtu>9216</mtu>
        <descr>Uplink to Leaf-2</descr>
        <adminSt>up</adminSt>
      </PhysIf-list>
      <PhysIf-list>
        <id>{{LEAF3-INT}}</id>
        <layer>Layer3</layer>
        <medium>p2p</medium>
        <mtu>9216</mtu>
        <descr>Uplink to LEAF-3</descr>
        <adminSt>up</adminSt>
      </PhysIf-list>
      <PhysIf-list>
        <id>{{LEAF4-INT}}</id>
        <layer>Layer3</layer>
        <medium>p2p</medium>
        <mtu>9216</mtu>
        <descr>Uplink to Leaf-4</descr>
        <adminSt>up</adminSt>
      </PhysIf-list>
    </phys-items>
    <lb-items>
      <LbRtdIf-list>
        <id>lo0</id>
        <descr>Underlay + Routing Functions</descr>
        <adminSt>up</adminSt>
      </LbRtdIf-list>
      <LbRtdIf-list>
        <id>lo1</id>
        <descr>RP Functions</descr>
        <adminSt>up</adminSt>
      </LbRtdIf-list>
	</lb-items>
  </intf-items>

request.description: Change SPINE-LOOP0 to SPINE2-LOOP0 if configuring spine 2

Enables these features:
 - feature bgp
 - feature ospf
 - feature nv overlay
 - feature vn-segment-vlan-based
 - feature interface-vlan
 - feature pim
 - nv overlay evpn
